channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. and Indian VCs just formed a $1B+ alliance to fund India’s deep tech startups
item.description: Eight U.S. and Indian VC and PE giants are teaming up to fuel India's deep tech boom.

item.title: Indian grocery startup Citymall raises $47M to challenge ultra-fast delivery giants
item.description: Indian e-commerce startup Citymall, which focuses on budget-focused grocery delivery for tier 2 and tier 3 towns, said today that it has raised $47 mi...

item.title: Meet the Guys Betting Big on AI Gambling Agents
item.description: Online gambling is a massive industry. The AI boom keeps booming. It was only a matter of time before people tried to put them together.

item.title: Meraki Espresso Machine Review (2025): Fine Grind, Loose Fit
item.description: Meraki's impressive new espresso machine offers features long reserved for more expensive machines—though this doesn't mean it's perfect

item.title: BMW, I am so breaking up with you
item.description: I’m driving my i4 back to the dealership as my lease is over. I'm surprised to say I can't wait.

item.title: LayerX uses AI to cut enterprise back-office workload, scores $100M in Series B
item.description: This Japanese AI startup just raised $100M to cut businesses’ admin burden.

item.title: India’s Offgrid raises $15M to make lithium optional for battery storage
item.description: India's Offgrid Energy Labs has developed proprietary zinc battery tech as a safer, more cost-effective alternative to lithium for energy storage.

item.title: Urban Arrow FamilyNext Pro Review: The Perfect Family Bike
item.description: The best electric cargo bike on the market just got front suspension and new headlights.

item.title: 62 Best Labor Day Sales on Gear We've Tested—Just a Few Hours Left
item.description: Summer is almost gone, and with it go these great Labor Day deals on WIRED-approved Bluetooth speakers, power banks, pizza ovens, and more.

item.title: The 79 Best Deals From REI’s 2025 Labor Day Sale
item.description: Shop the best deals on WIRED-tested outdoor gear from REI, Nemo, MSR, Coleman, Fjällräven, and more during REI’s Labor Day sale.
